message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a starting price of $16,000. I'm confident it will be valuable for you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is significantly below its value. Could you do $14,000?
I understand that you think the product is worth more than $10,000, but I'm still not comfortable with $14,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. Can you consider that?
